citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:40 pm on
08-Nov-17.
The inspector arrived at the facility at 2:40 pm and spoke to the licensee over the phone who stated that she was
not available for the inspection. The inspector left the facility.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:40 pm on
08-Nov-17.
The inspector arrived at the facility at 2:40 pm and spoke to the licensee over the phone who stated that she was
not available for the inspection.  The inspector left the facility.
